equals 3 to the power of 2 plus 2 end exponent space x space space 3 to the power of 4 plus 2 end exponent
equals 3 to the power of 4 space x space space 3 to the power of 6
equals 3 to the power of 4.6 end exponent
equals 3 to the power of 24
